title: Bloogton Tower
content:
Hello,

I have got a Problem in Bloogton Tower (I am playing hard mode):
If you count the floor on which one starts out this level as floor 0, than I am standing on floor 3 in front of a door for which I need a blue keygem. There seems no other way around that door - I have tried to jump up a little bit to the left of that door - without avail.
I have been patient: I have searched all the places I could get to in this level, found all the hidden points, but not the blue keygem.
Probably I am not ingenius enough for this part of the level. Can anyone help me out?

title: Re: Bloogton Tower
content:
Sometimes those little Blooglets carry around keys of their own colour.
Try finding and shooting a blue one and see if it has a gem.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: blue
content:
Thank you Retodon8!

I have read somewhere, that these little creatures like the keygems of their color. Now I know what it means [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: blue
content:
Yes; they're all rock collectors!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
